name: A 90s Game
description:
Hey Kids!

Do you like protecting the environment?

I sure hope you do because there's a tree that needs protecting from EVIL Lumberjacks and a park that needs cleaning from Endless Trash! 

If you don't protect the environment than all hell will break loose! LITERALLY!!!

Public Domain Songs Used:

Game On by Jeremy Korpas

Bright eyed Blues by Unicorn Heads

Crazy Blues by Freedom Trail Studio

Jazz Me Blues by E's Jammy Jams
